GWAS files

gwas.list.Rd

The genome-wide association studies (GWAS) files of the 10 sex-stratified continental Africa cohorts.

Usage

gwas.list

Format

A list of 10 sex-stratified GWAS files. Each component of the list refers to one GWAS file. Each GWA study file has mandatory column headers:

MARKERNAME

snp name

EA

effect allele

NEA

non effect allele

EAF

effect allele frequency

CHROMOSOME

chromosome of marker

POSITION

position of marker

BETA

allelic effect

SE

standard error

On this page
